column4: I hate to interupt, but I'm attempting to identify if there is a known display issue for attempting to run Ubuntu on a tablet PC.

I'm trying to set up a dual boot with vista already installed. It goes through the full 7 steps of the instal process, but comes to a display error after the instal alegedly completes. Is anyone aware of an issue like this?
: nev√∂ mind.. a bit light-headed for all the sleeplesness.. or smthng..
